title: Motion pictures produced by American Mutoscope and Biograph Company, 1906. [Pt. 2]
brief_description:
Compilation of silent motion pictures produced by Amwerican Mutoscope and Biograph Company.
Contents: The Tunnel workers (1908)—The Skyscrapers of New York (1908)
Films restored from the Library of Congress paper prints.
